author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA RAPIDLY WEAKENING WELL TO THE SOUTH OF HAWAII...
summary: ...IONA RAPIDLY WEAKENING WELL TO THE SOUTH OF HAWAII... As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Jul 29 the center of Iona was located near 11.3, -158.6 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA RAPIDLY WEAKENING WELL TO THE SOUTH OF HAWAII... As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Jul 29 the center of Iona was located near 11.3, -158.6 with movement W at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Iona (CP1/CP012025)
